channel.title: How do u sign in when playing?

item.title: How do u sign in when playing?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote author=Domo_Master link=topic=523379.msg3806748#msg3806748 date=1320531667]

[quote=“Domo_Master, post:1, topic:420703”]When I do that it says that the password is incorrect so I tested it on the forums and it worked?? I did /login < ************>[/quote]Then go into your profile and set your minecraft password there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u sign in when playing?

item.title: How do u sign in when playing?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“normanosbourne, post:3, topic:420703”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=523379.msg3806723#msg3806723 date=1320529816]

Help!!!
[/quote]/login YOURPASSWORDHERE

hey i was wondering if you would help me too with this.
it glitches sometimes for me when i attempt to login, is the server updated to 1.9? cause im still using 1.8[/quote]No its 1.8.1…Your password is your forum password.

Read full topic
